name: df-zlm
body: |- wceq(czlm, cmpt(s0, universe, co(co(cv(s0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), zring)), csts, cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cmg, cv(s0))))))
comment: Augment an abelian group with vector space operations to turn it into a ` ZZ ` -module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
